name: CEFHA TRUST (Centre for Humanitarian Assistance Trust)

address: Flat No: 501, Revathi Hills, B.S. Layout, Seetammadhara

briefDescription: CeFHA is Non Profit Organisation, that works with the Rural communities and Urban slums in Visakhapatnam District. CeFHA focuses on child rights, women rights activities. Children, Women People with Disability and Farmers are the major focus of the Organisation. Sustainable Agriculture, low carbon farming, Child networks, Mutually aided thrift and credit cooperative are all initiated activities of CeFHA in the field. CeFHA acts as a catalyst in realising peoples dreams by working towards the mission. A just society with equal rights and inclusiveness are the motto towards which CeFHA works.
